analysis.description:
BusTokenLock.withdrawLeftTokens (/unique_contracts/0x735d580ccf39db73f26d14ddb88d81bd0cf72ee3.sol#379-384) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,token.balanceOf(address(this)) - tokensAtLeastHold) (/unique_contracts/0x735d580ccf39db73f26d14ddb88d81bd0cf72ee3.sol#380-384)

BusTokenLock.withdraw (/unique_contracts/0x735d580ccf39db73f26d14ddb88d81bd0cf72ee3.sol#394-409) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(investor,withdrawTotal) (/unique_contracts/0x735d580ccf39db73f26d14ddb88d81bd0cf72ee3.sol)

Reentrancy in BusTokenLock.addInvestor (/unique_contracts/0x735d580ccf39db73f26d14ddb88d81bd0cf72ee3.sol#359-376):
	External calls:
	- amount = _amount * (10 ** token.decimals()) (/unique_contracts/0x735d580ccf39db73f26d14ddb88d81bd0cf72ee3.sol#362-363)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_contracts/0x735d580ccf39db73f26d14ddb88d81bd0cf72ee3.sol#368-369)
	- investorCount (/unique_contracts/0x735d580ccf39db73f26d14ddb88d81bd0cf72ee3.sol#365)
	- tokensAllocatedTotal (/unique_contracts/0x735d580ccf39db73f26d14ddb88d81bd0cf72ee3.sol#370)
	- tokensAtLeastHold (/unique_contracts/0x735d580ccf39db73f26d14ddb88d81bd0cf72ee3.sol#370)

Reentrancy in BusTokenLock.withdraw (/unique_contracts/0x735d580ccf39db73f26d14ddb88d81bd0cf72ee3.sol#394-409):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(investor,withdrawTotal) (/unique_contracts/0x735d580ccf39db73f26d14ddb88d81bd0cf72ee3.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensAtLeastHold (/unique_contracts/0x735d580ccf39db73f26d14ddb88d81bd0cf72ee3.sol)
